entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:52 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 12:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 64 %
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near zero.
